resources.string:
I am an introvert and I dont talk much but when i get comfortable with you,for sure,you will regret it 

 I like to eat,yall eat to live whereas i live to eat #weaintsame 

 I also love memes and the memes you like,I might have seen it way long back,dont think you can out-meme me 

 My hobbies, I really dont know,Its like my enthusiam lives on for like a couple of days,max weeks and then poof,back to square one

 Honestly COVID didnt affect me much,I kinda like it ,no no no dont get me wrong,I meant I like the online class and stuffs
